product_name: Amphipod Micro-Light Flashing Reflective Armband - Pink
long_description: The pink Amphipod Micro-Light Flashing reflective armband attaches to just about anything to keep you visible during nighttime activities. Fits on your arm or ankle, and can be strapped to a backpack or bicycle. 4 separate red LEDs and end-to-end reflectivity catch the eye of oncoming motorists. Turn the LEDs on and off with a simple press of a button. Amphipod Micro-Light Flashing reflective armband operates on a single CR2032 battery (included) that's easy to replace.
short_description: The pink Amphipod Micro-Light Flashing reflective armband attaches to just about anything to keep you visible during nighttime activities.
